name: Refighter
description:
INSTALLING
I have not had a chance to test this program on other computers.
To use this program, you need Python3 installed on your computer.
To install the necessary files, open a command line, navigate to this directory using 'cd' and run 'pip install pygame numpy'

Then run 'python main.py' to run the game.

PLAYING
Use the spacebar to block incoming attacks
The z button will change the ship's color but has no influence on gameplay
